history.proof: intros. hauto lq: on use: SF_map_lx unfold: SF_sorted.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros. unfold SF_sorted, SF_map. destruct s as [hx tx]. unfold sorted. simpl. intros. induction tx. - simpl. apply Forall_nil. - simpl. destruct a as [a1 a2]. destruct x as [x1 x2]. simpl in H. apply Forall_cons. + simpl in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. auto. + apply IHtx. simpl in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. auto.
